user_query: I want to start my day with a good laugh. Can you help me find a funny joke that will kickstart my morning? It would be great if the joke could be about sports or athletic humor. Additionally, I would like to get a list of jokes to share with my colleagues. Please provide me with at least 10 jokes.

TaskList.description: Fetch a single sports-related joke to kickstart the user's morning.
Retrieve a list of at least 10 sports-related jokes for sharing.
